LoadPriority.description: The load priority of the mod. If using code from another mod, make sure that your load priority is higher than the other mod's.

ConVars.description: Any configuration variables for the mod. ConVars are persistent configurable variables. No matter the type of your variables, they have to be strings, otherwise the game will not start.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for the ConVar.

HelpString.description: The help message for the ConVar.

Flags.description: Any custom behaviors for the ConVar. Check the modding docs for more info.

Scripts.description: rSquirrel scripts for the mod. Scripts define custom logic.

Path.description: The path to the script, without the `scripts/vscripts` prefix (which is the directory they should go in.

RunOn.description: A boolean expression that defines when the script should be compiled and used. Check the modding docs for more info.

ClientCallback.description: A callback function run before or after map spawn on the CLIENT VM.

Before.description: A callback function to be run before map spawn.

After.description: A callback function to be run after map spawn

ServerCallback.description: A callback function run before or after map spawn on the SERVER VM.

Before.description: A callback function to be run before map spawn.

After.description: A callback function to be run after map spawn

Localisation.description: Localization files. Contain information about languages.
